funeral.title: Desejos Fúnebres
funeral.description: As suas preferências para arranjos fúnebres e cerimónias memoriais.
funeral.placeholder:
Descreva os seus desejos para o seu funeral ou cerimónia memorial...

Por exemplo:
- Tipo de serviço (religioso, secular, celebração da vida)
- Preferências de enterro ou cremação
- Preferências de localização
- Música, leituras ou pedidos especiais
- Quem deve falar ou participar
- Quaisquer tradições específicas a seguir

digital.title: Encerramento de Contas Digitais
digital.description: Instruções para lidar com a sua presença digital e contas online.
digital.placeholder:
Liste as suas contas digitais e como devem ser tratadas...

Por exemplo:
- Contas de redes sociais (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn)
- Contas de e-mail
- Armazenamento na nuvem (Google Drive, Dropbox)
- Serviços de assinatura (Netflix, Spotify)
- Contas bancárias e financeiras online
- Carteiras de criptomoedas
- Websites ou nomes de domínio

contacts.title: Contactos Importantes
contacts.description: Pessoas chave que este guardião deve contactar ou notificar.
contacts.placeholder: Adicione contactos importantes específicos para as responsabilidades deste guardião.

documents.title: Localizações de Documentos
documents.description: Onde encontrar documentos físicos e digitais importantes.
documents.placeholder:
Descreva onde se encontram os documentos importantes...

Por exemplo:
- Localização do testamento
- Apólices de seguro
- Escrituras de propriedade
- Informações de contas bancárias
- Documentos de investimento
- Declarações de impostos
- Palavras-passe e códigos de acesso
- Localização e chave do cofre

messages.title: Mensagens Pessoais
messages.description: Mensagens pessoais e pensamentos finais para este guardião.
messages.placeholder:
Escreva uma mensagem pessoal a este guardião...

Esta é a sua oportunidade para:
- Expressar os seus sentimentos e gratidão
- Partilhar memórias importantes
- Fornecer orientação ou conselhos
- Explicar as suas decisões
- Deixar palavras de conforto
- Partilhar as suas esperanças para o futuro

practical.title: Instruções Práticas
practical.description: Passos práticos imediatos e responsabilidades para este guardião.
practical.placeholder:
Liste tarefas práticas e ações imediatas...

Por exemplo:
- Lista de verificação para as primeiras 24-48 horas
- Quem notificar primeiro
- Contas ou pagamentos urgentes
- Instruções de cuidados (animais de estimação, plantas, propriedade)
- Assuntos de negócios que requerem atenção
- Marcações agendadas a cancelar
- Chaves e códigos de acesso necessários

suddenPassing.title: What if something happens to you tomorrow?
suddenPassing.description: The ultimate test of your preparation. Is your family ready to navigate this difficult time without chaos?

descriptions.billsGoUnpaid: Your family can't access your primary checking account to pay the mortgage.
descriptions.businessDecisionsStall: Clients and employees don't know who is authorized to make decisions.
descriptions.familyCannotManageFinances: Your spouse can now legally manage all financial matters, ensuring bills are paid and investments are protected.
descriptions.familyCannotAccessBankAccount: Your family can now pay bills and manage daily expenses without delay or legal complications.
descriptions.businessNoLeadership: Your business can continue operating smoothly with clear leadership and decision-making processes.
descriptions.noWillFound: The family cannot locate or confirm the existence of a will.
descriptions.insuranceDetailsUnknown: Life insurance policy details and beneficiaries are unknown.
descriptions.notifyImmediateFamily: Ensure all immediate family members are informed.
descriptions.securePhysicalProperty: Ensure that the home and vehicles are secure.
descriptions.contactExecutor: Reach out to John Smith to start will proceedings.
descriptions.locateWill: Locate and secure the will at the designated location.
descriptions.executorBeginsProbate: The executor will file for probate to manage the estate.
descriptions.activatePowerOfAttorney: Ensure designated person can make decisions.
descriptions.arrangeBillPayments: Set up automatic payments or delegate to trusted person.
descriptions.fileDisabilityBenefits: Submit necessary paperwork for insurance claims.

scenarios.title: What Happens When Life Takes an Unexpected Turn?
scenarios.subtitle: Real families, real situations, real control and preparedness

before.situation: Sarah's husband had a heart attack. While he was in intensive care, she spent days trying to find their insurance papers, bank account information, and important contacts. The stress was overwhelming when she needed to focus on his recovery.
before.consequence: Days of searching for information and support.

after.situation: When Mark had his accident, his wife Lisa opened their family guide and found everything organized: insurance details, bank contacts, medical information, and even a list of people to notify. She could focus on what mattered most - being there for Mark.
after.benefit: Immediate access to everything she needed.

before.situation: When David's flight was delayed and he missed his daughter's emergency surgery, his wife couldn't access their savings account or find their medical insurance information. Critical decisions had to wait.

after.situation: When Emma's husband was traveling and she needed emergency funds for their son's surgery, she had immediate access to all account information, insurance details, and even pre-written authorization letters. No delays, no stress.
after.benefit: Everything accessible right when she needed it.

before.situation: After losing her father suddenly, Maria spent months trying to piece together his financial affairs. She found accounts she didn't know existed and missed important deadlines because documents were scattered everywhere.

after.situation: When John's family needed to handle his affairs, everything was clearly organized: a complete list of accounts, important contacts, step-by-step instructions, and even personal messages he'd prepared for each family member.
after.benefit: A clear path to follow in difficult times.

bottomCta.primary: Don't Let Your Family Face This Chaos
bottomCta.urgency: Every day you wait is another day your family is unprepared

testimonials.1: After my brother's sudden accident, I watched my sister-in-law struggle for weeks to find important documents and passwords. That's when I knew I couldn't let the same thing happen to my family.
testimonials.2: As a single mom running a business, I worried constantly about what would happen if something happened to me. Heritage Vault helped me organize everything.
testimonials.3: My wife has early-stage dementia, and I realized I needed to prepare while I still could. Heritage Vault made it simple to organize our 40 years of life together.

annualReview.title: Annual Legacy Review
annualReview.subtitle: Keep your family's protection plan current and effective
annualReview.description: Life changes quickly. This annual review ensures your legacy plan stays aligned with your current situation and wishes.

step1.title: Review Your Executors
step1.description: Confirm your trusted people are still the right choices for your family

step2.title: Review Your Assets
step2.description: Verify your asset inventory is current and complete

step3.title: Review Your Beneficiaries
step3.description: Ensure your beneficiaries are still the right people

step4.title: Complete Review
step4.description: Finalize your annual review and update your plan

commandRoster.title: Command Roster Review
commandRoster.description: Your executors and trusted people are the foundation of your family's protection plan.
commandRoster.executorQuestion: Is {name} still the right person to be your executor?
commandRoster.guardianQuestion: Is {name} still the right person to care for your children?
commandRoster.trustedPersonQuestion: Is {name} still the right person for {role}?

armory.title: Asset Inventory Review
armory.description: Your assets are what you're protecting. Keep this inventory current.
armory.valueQuestion: Has the value of {assetName} changed significantly?
armory.locationQuestion: Is the location of {assetName} still correct?

beneficiaries.title: Beneficiary Review
beneficiaries.description: Ensure the right people receive the right assets at the right time.
beneficiaries.confirmationQuestion: Are these still the correct people to receive these assets?
beneficiaries.distributionQuestion: Is the distribution percentage still correct?
beneficiaries.contactQuestion: Are the contact details for {name} still current?

complete.title: Review Complete
complete.description: Your annual review has been completed successfully.
complete.message: Your annual review has been completed. Your family's protection plan is now current and effective.
complete.noChanges: No changes were needed. Your plan is current.
complete.reminder: We'll remind you when it's time for your next annual review.

complexityReduction.title: Simplify Your Legacy Planning
complexityReduction.subtitle: Break down complex tasks into simple, manageable steps
complexityReduction.description: We understand that planning for the future can feel overwhelming. Our complexity reduction system breaks down every task into simple, actionable steps that take just minutes to complete.

overwhelm.title: Eliminates Overwhelm
overwhelm.description: Instead of facing a massive to-do list, you tackle one small task at a time. Each step is designed to be completed in under 5 minutes.

progress.title: Visible Progress
progress.description: See your family's preparedness grow with each completed step. Track your progress and celebrate small wins along the way.

confidence.title: Builds Confidence
confidence.description: As you complete each step, you'll feel more confident and in control. What once seemed impossible becomes achievable.

family.title: Family Protection
family.description: Every completed step directly protects your family. From emergency access to long-term planning, each action matters.

identifyBankAccount.title: Identify Your Primary Bank Account
identifyBankAccount.why: Why this matters: Immediate access to funds during emergencies
identifyBankAccount.whatYouDo: What you do: Take a photo or write down account information
identifyBankAccount.whatWeDo: What we do: Securely store information and create access instructions

emergencyContacts.title: List Emergency Contacts
emergencyContacts.why: Why this matters: Quick access to important people during crises
emergencyContacts.whatYouDo: What you do: Add phone numbers and relationships
emergencyContacts.whatWeDo: What we do: Organize contacts by priority and create emergency protocols

insurancePolicies.title: Document Insurance Policies
insurancePolicies.why: Why this matters: Ensures claims can be filed quickly and correctly
insurancePolicies.whatYouDo: What you do: Upload policy documents or take photos
insurancePolicies.whatWeDo: What we do: Extract key information and create claim instructions

digitalAssets.title: Secure Digital Assets
digitalAssets.why: Why this matters: Protects online accounts and digital memories
digitalAssets.whatYouDo: What you do: List important accounts and passwords
digitalAssets.whatWeDo: What we do: Create secure access protocols and backup instructions

legalDocuments.title: Organize Legal Documents
legalDocuments.why: Why this matters: Ensures legal wishes are followed and processes are smooth
legalDocuments.whatYouDo: What you do: Upload wills, powers of attorney, and other documents
legalDocuments.whatWeDo: What we do: Create summaries and ensure proper legal access

familyInstructions.title: Write Family Instructions
familyInstructions.why: Why this matters: Provides clear guidance during difficult times
familyInstructions.whatYouDo: What you do: Write personal messages and instructions
familyInstructions.whatWeDo: What we do: Organize messages and create delivery schedules

stepByStep.title: Step-by-Step Guidance
stepByStep.description: Each task is broken down into clear, simple instructions that anyone can follow.

timeEstimation.title: Accurate Time Estimates
timeEstimation.description: Know exactly how long each step will take, from 2 minutes to 15 minutes maximum.

difficultyLevels.title: Clear Difficulty Levels
difficultyLevels.description: Simple, Easy, Medium, and Complex ratings help you choose what to tackle first.

progressTracking.title: Progress Tracking
progressTracking.description: See your family's preparedness grow with each completed step.

helpAvailable.title: Help When You Need It
helpAvailable.description: Get assistance, explanations, and support for any step that feels challenging.

driversLicense.title: Take a photo of your driver's license
driversLicense.description: Your family will need this for legal and financial matters. Having a clear photo saves them time and stress.
driversLicense.completionMessage: Your family now has access to critical ID information.

passport.title: Photograph your passport
passport.description: Essential for international travel arrangements and legal identification.
passport.completionMessage: International travel documentation is now secured for your family.

birthCertificate.title: Scan your birth certificate
birthCertificate.description: Required for many legal processes and family history documentation.
birthCertificate.completionMessage: Birth certificate is now digitally preserved for future needs.

socialSecurityCard.title: Document your Social Security card
socialSecurityCard.description: Critical for benefits and legal identification processes.
socialSecurityCard.completionMessage: Social Security information is now safely documented.

bankAccounts.title: List your bank accounts
bankAccounts.description: Help your family manage finances and access funds when needed.
bankAccounts.completionMessage: Bank account information is now organized for your family.

insurancePolicies.title: Compile insurance policy details
insurancePolicies.description: Ensure your family knows about all coverage and can file claims.
insurancePolicies.completionMessage: Insurance information is now comprehensive and accessible.

medicalRecords.title: Organize medical history
medicalRecords.description: Help healthcare providers understand your medical background.
medicalRecords.completionMessage: Medical history is now organized for better healthcare decisions.

medications.title: List current medications
medications.description: Critical for medical emergencies and ongoing care.
medications.completionMessage: Medication list is now available for medical professionals.

will.title: Create or update your will
will.description: Ensure your wishes are clearly documented and legally binding.
will.completionMessage: Your will is now current and legally protected.

powerOfAttorney.title: Designate power of attorney
powerOfAttorney.description: Authorize trusted individuals to make decisions on your behalf.
powerOfAttorney.completionMessage: Power of attorney is now properly designated.

digitalPasswords.title: Secure digital password list
digitalPasswords.description: Help family access important online accounts and services.
digitalPasswords.completionMessage: Digital access is now safely organized for your family.

socialMedia.title: Plan social media accounts
socialMedia.description: Decide how your online presence should be handled.
socialMedia.completionMessage: Social media legacy is now planned and documented.

editStoryModal.description: Share the story behind "{{assetName}}". This personal touch will be invaluable to your loved ones.

placeholders.story: e.g., This was your grandmother's wedding ring, given to her in 1952 when she married your grandfather in the small church in their hometown. She wore it every day for 65 years...

tips.title: Tips for a meaningful story:
tips.explainSpecial: Explain why this item is special to you
tips.describeHistory: Describe its history or how you acquired it
tips.mentionWishes: Mention any wishes for how it should be used or kept

errors.notAuthenticated: You must be logged in to save a story
